description: Euler totient function phi(n) is divisible by a square.
comments: For k > 2 and p a prime: p^k is in this sequence. - _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Apr 25 2013
links: Enrique Pérez Herrero, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2500
example: 72 and 73 belong because neither phi[72] = 24 nor phi[73] = 72 are squarefree.
author: _Labos Elemer_
